                                         Img Loc: RADIOLOGY MAIN FLOOR
                                         Service: MEDICINE
Pregnancy Screen: Patient answered no

 

(Case 53 COMPLETE)   CHEST 2 VIEWS PA&LAT             (RAD  Detailed) CPT:71020
     Reason for Study: follow up pneumonia

    Clinical History:
      Patient admitted to the hospital 11/18 with pneumonia - follow up
      exam 

    Report Status: Verified                   Date Reported: NOV 19, 2011
                                              Date Verified: MAY 30, 2012
    Verifier E-Sig:

    Report:
      Comparison study: 11/18/2011. Lung volumes are normal
      bilaterally. Heart size is normal. The dense consolidations seen
      in both the right and the left lower lobes are mildly improved. 
      No pnuemothorax.  No definite effusion.  

    Impression:
      improved bilateral lower lobe pneumonia 

    Primary Diagnostic Code: ABNORMALITY, ATTN. NEEDED

Primary Interpreting Staff:
  THIRTYTWO AVIVAUSER, Staff Physician
          Verified by transcriptionist for THIRTYTWO AVIVAUSER
/AJC
